string-array.name: myQuotes
string-array.item: ``A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous´´ - Coco Chanel
``True intelligence requires fabulous imagination´´ - Ian Mcewan
``You cannot fake chic but you﻿ can be chic and fake fur´´ - Karl Lagerfeld
``Elegance does not consist in putting on a new dress´´ - Coco Chanel

``I never worry about diets. The only carrots that interest me are the number you get in a diamond´´
- Mae West
``Big girls need big diamonds´´ - Elizabeth Taylor
